title.rendered: Kotak Mahindra Prime Ltd. Backs 8 Smile on Wheels Projects Across India

content.rendered:
Kotak Mahindra Prime Ltd. Backs 8 Smile on Wheels Projects Across India

Kotak Mahindra Prime Ltd. (KMPL) has partnered with Smile Foundation to support eight Smile on Wheels (SOW) mobile health units. These units operate in key regions, with two units serving Vadodara in Gujarat, four in Bangalore, Karnataka and two in Jalandhar, Punjab. The mobile health units aim to deliver critical healthcare services to underserved communities in these areas.
